position.marginalia_text: natura disponit me[m]bra ip[s]ius foetus, sic et istud corpus rubeum est pars integralis eleisiris, seu medicina[e]. Nam in omni compositione, qua[e] fit, postq[uam] istud corpus creatum est, cadit, semper tanq[uam] pars integralis co[m]positionis, vt inferius declarabitur. Item notetis quod istud corpus habet multa no[m]i[n]a. Vocatur eni[m] Adam, A[e]stas, almagra, altun, anima, aries, aurum, cancer, Camereth, cinis tartai Cholera, Corpus propriu[m], Corpus rubeum, Corsufle, Deeb, Dehab, Ferrum, Forma, frater, Fructus, Gallus, Gophris, gumma rubea, Homo, Juventus, Kibrit, Lapis indrademus, Lapis indus, Lapis rubeus, Lux, magnesia rubea, mane, Mars, Marthek, Masculus Metros, minera, Neusi, Nutus, Oleum martis, Oleum inco[n]bustabile, Oleum rubeum, Oliva, Oriens, Pater, Reczon, rubedo, rubinus, Sal vrina[e], Sericon, SOL, sulphur rubeum, Terra rubea, Tertius, thion, Vinum, Vitellus, vitrolium rubeum, vitrum, zaaph, et etia[m] multis alijs no[min]ibus a sapie[n]tibus appelllatur: qua[e] quide[m] no[m]i[n]a no[n] sunt ei attributa secund[m] vna[m] r[ati]o[n]em, seu proportione[m]. Na[m] philosophi qui vocaveru[n]t eum Adam, a[e]state[m], Almagra, Altum, anima[m], ariete[m], auru[m], cancru[m], Carmeth, Cholera[m], cinere[m] tartari, corpus p[ro]priu[m], corsufle, Deeb, Debab, Forma[m], fratre[m], fructum, gallu[m] gophris, Homine[m] inventute[m], Kibrit, Lapidem indrademu[m]. lapide[m] indu[m], Luce[m] mane, martem/Marthek, Masculum, Metron, Minera[m], Neusim, Nutum, Olivam, Oriente[m], Patre[m], Reczon, Sal vrina[e], solem, tertium, thion, vinum, vitru[m], Zaaph, dixerunt hoc propter sua[m] complexione[m]. Na[m] o[mn]ia ha[e]c dixeru[n]t quia calida[e] et sicca[e] co[m]plexionis sunt. Qui vero vocaverunt ip[s]um corpus rubeum, gumma[m] rubea[m], lapide[m] rubeu[m], Magnesia[m] rubea[m], Oleu[m] rubeu[m], rubedine[m], Rubinu[m], seriron, Sulphur rubeu[m], Terra[m] rubeu[m]
